reviewText: The final dvd of season 1 of The Ghost and Mrs. Muir released! And waiting for season 2 Of the Ghost and Mrs. Muir!! Great show and Amazon has done a superb job on the dvds!!!!!
Waited a long time for these!
Such great acting, chemistry between Hope Lange, Edward Mulhare, and Reta Shaw - plus the children actors are very good, as of course Charles Nelson Reilly -
I love them.  They are just as I remember.
Fantastic quality for a show this old.
So happy to have this on DVD!  My daughter and I have enjoyed watching it.  Favorite show of mine from the past.
I watched the main show  and loved it. Then I remembered a weekly series. I found this and bought it. great dvd. the dvd has several episodes per dvd....
This is such a decent show and the entire family would enjoy watching.
Thank you for the disc. It is in great shape. I came so quicky. I will enjoy it for manny year to come. ART
loved this one
Glad this series is now available on dvd!
Good, but the movie is better
The quality of this tape is very good,,, all that I have gotten so far of this series so far I would recommend~
It was great! I'm looking for Season 2 Disk 4 you don't have it on your website. Is it available now! It's the only one I'm missing!
one of my favorite series
GOOD

I love this show and have waited YEARS for a clear quality image and sound dvd set. This DVD set has the sound and image quality, it looks better than it did via "rabbit ears". But....WHERE ARE THE EIGHT MISSING EPISODES?! AMAZON, OR WHO EVER DECIDES THESE THINGS....MAKE THOSE 8 MISSING EPOSIDES AVALABLE AND LETS FINALLY HAVE A COMPLETE SET OF THE GHOST AND MRS. MUIR!!!

WHY LEAVE OUT 8 EPISODES WTF?

Four stars...you will get Five when you provide the missing episodes. Thanks for a good product just not complete!!!!!
good show
Loved it.  Could not wait to watch it
It's been really awome to see these episodes again!
I love this show, I have several of the dvds already. Please print more dvds of the show. I would like all the episodes, please.
